item.title: How to host a simple static website
item.description: We all at some point in time thought about having a simple personal website. It may be for writing about your travel trips, posting pictures of food that you cooked or ranting about the tech which you don’t like. I will leave the reason to you. The very first step is owning a domain. For eg. this websites domain name is rvignesh.in You might’ve heard Godaddy.com. One of the famous ones.
